short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help you automatically login in websites about XJTLU

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
自动填写表单并自动登录西交利物浦大学的相关网站，能够在一定程度上解决跳转到学习中心登录导致的繁琐问题。
Automatically filling in forms and automatically logging in to relevant websites of Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University, which can solve the cumbersomeness caused by jumping into study centre for logining.

账号密码将会由chrome.storage接口上传至chrome账号云端。
The account password will be uploaded to the chrome account cloud through the chrome.storage interface.

初次使用时，需要在浏览器右上角的插件栏找到这个插件点击，并输入你的账号密码，然后提交。每次你的账号密码发生改动时也需要重新提交。
For the first time, you need to click this plugin in the plugin bar in the upper right corner of the browser, enter your account password, and submit it. You also need to resubmit your account when it is changed.
